search.query: | inputlookup ctf_badges | lookup ctf_badge_entitlements BadgeNumber | eval user=if(isnull(user),"None",user) | mvexpand user `get_user_info` | eval user=if(isnull(StealthModeTeam),user, "Member of ".StealthModeTeam) | eval DisplayUsername=if(isnull(StealthModeTeam),DisplayUsername, "Member of ".StealthModeTeam) | stats values(Team) as Teams values(DisplayUsername) as Users by BadgeNumber BadgeURL BadgeName BadgeDescription | eval BadgeURL=mvjoin(BadgeURL, ",") | sort BadgeNumber | fields - BadgeNumber | eval Teams=mvindex(Teams, 0, 10) | eval Users=mvindex(Users, 0, 10)
